title: Human Resources Leader for Business Partnerships - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. ™ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Human Resources Leader for Business Partnerships Sports Management Posted/Updated: 10-01-2015 Brief Job Description: Provide day-to-day leadership to a team of Human Resource Generalists  partnering with them to find solutions and to ensure HR excellence in all that we do.
